title: Did Trump promise a COVID-19 vaccine by election day?
subtitle: After the outbreak of the COVID-19 epidemic, the President of the United States repeatedly flirted with allegations that vaccination would be available "very soon."
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The President of the United States, Donald Trump, promised that by November 3, 2020, the COVID-19 vaccine would be readily available to the public.
